entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Drizzle, -3.6°C

Visibility: 8 km
Humidity: 95 %

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Snow beginning near noon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
